title: Chat issues
body: It doesn't allow me to connect to the chat and I cant seem to reconnect, I know its not just my laptop or anything because it happened to my friend at the same time. Any ideas?

replies.body:
Hiya! 

We're currently investigating the issue. MuffyKing [made a post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/Nf5ToE3O-client-alot-of-players-from-southern-states-cant-connect-to-client-chat?comment=0004) regarding this issue, and how you can provide more info to help us get to the bottom of this. :]
Same thing is happening to me. Its not my internet because i have tried logging in from two different league of legends apps on my phone on separate connections.
